summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear and testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021. The document is signed by U.S. Attorney Damian Williams.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)) for which the subpoena is issued.

persons.name: Damian Williams
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear in court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 318, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on November 15, 2021, for an individual to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.
The scheduled court appearance was for November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 318.
The subpoena was issued by U.S. Attorney Damian Williams for the Southern District of New York.
Failure to comply with the subpoena would constitute contempt of court and subject the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The document is related to the ongoing federal prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell (case number 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
